statements: SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_name LIKE 'Gold%';
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE educational_achievement_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100 ORDER BY reward_id DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points <= 50 ORDER BY reward_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE educational_achievement_id IS NOT NULL AND reward_points BETWEEN 50 AND 150;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_name LIKE 'Gold%' ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*), SUM(reward_points) FROM rewards WHERE educational_achievement_id = 101;
SELECT currency_id, currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5 ORDER BY currency_name ASC
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE currency_name='Euro'
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate < 1.0
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_type='Gift' ORDER BY reward_points DESC
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points >= 100
SELECT * FROM currencies ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate * 10 AS adjusted_rate FROM currencies;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_points BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY reward_name ASC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_type FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'Discount';
SELECT * FROM in_game_currencies;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM in_game_currencies;
SELECT reward_name, reward_type, reward_value FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_value DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_points FROM achievements WHERE achievement_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'item';
SELECT * FROM in_game_currencies ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM in_game_currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT reward_name, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'item';
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_points FROM achievements WHERE achievement_points >= 100 ORDER BY achievement_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_type IN ('weapon', 'armor') ORDER BY reward_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM currencies;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE currency_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_name ASC;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name, currency_name FROM rewards JOIN currencies ON rewards.currency_id = currencies.currency_id;
SELECT user_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM user_achievements JOIN achievements ON user_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id;
SELECT * FROM currencies;
SELECT currency_id, currency_name FROM currencies ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT reward_name, reward_description FROM rewards WHERE currency_id = 2 ORDER BY reward_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM user_achievements WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM currency WHERE currency_id = 1
SELECT currency_name, currency_symbol FROM currency WHERE currency_value > 100
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player WHERE player_email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_points FROM achievement WHERE achievement_points >= 50

SELECT player_name, achievement_name FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievement ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievement.achievement_id
SELECT * FROM currency WHERE currency_value > 50
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_points FROM achievement WHERE achievement_points >= 100 ORDER BY achievement_points DESC

SELECT player.player_name, achievement.achievement_name FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievement ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievement.achievement_id

SELECT player.player_name, currency.currency_name, player_currency.currency_amount FROM player JOIN player_currency ON player.player_id = player_currency.player_id JOIN currency ON player_currency.currency_id = currency.currency_id WHERE player_currency.currency_amount > 100 ORDER BY currency.currency_name
